alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Columbus, northwestern Horry and northeastern Marion Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gapway, or near Mullins, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mullins, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Bethel, Fair Bluff, Cherry Grove, Nakina, Mollie, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Evergreen, Green Sea, Nichols and Cerro Gordo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
